Class AlbumViewController

java.lang.Object
controllers.AlbumViewController
public class AlbumViewController
extends java.lang.Object
Handles the album view page
Author:
Swapnil Napuri, Srinandini Marpaka

    • start

      public void start​(User currentUser, Album currentAlbum) throws java.io.IOException
      Sets up the 'Album View' screen
      Parameters:
      currentUser - user logged in
      currentAlbum - album opened
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if photo preview file is not found

    • loadAlbum

      public void loadAlbum() throws java.io.IOException
      Loads the photos in the album
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if photo preview file is not found

    • onActionAddPhoto

      public void onActionAddPhoto​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e) throws java.io.IOException
      Adds the selected photo to the album
      Parameters:
      e - represents that the 'Add Photo' button has been clicked
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if photo preview file is not found

      private void invalidPhotoAlert()
      Informs the user that he/she added a photo already in the album

      Logs the user out and takes him/her to the login screen

      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if logout screen file is not found
